name: NYDailyNews
text:
Chuck Woolery claims he never said COVID-19 was hoax.

“The most outrageous lies are the ones about COVID-19. Everyone is lying ... I think it’s all about the election and keeping the economy from coming back,” was the statement Woolery was clarifying.
https://t.co/X63ndUFQT4

name: NYDailyNews
text:
A traveling businessman caught filming women in hotel rooms did it "all over the country," according to his confession.

Robert Mann Privette allegedly admitted to have done his voyeurism more than 10 times in the past year alone.
https://t.co/SyL7uJiWzs

name: NYDailyNews
text:
The owners of Tony Luke’s Philly cheesesteak shop were charged with tax evasion.

The father-son team hid almost $8 million of income between 2006 and 2016 by keeping two sets of books.
https://t.co/DCLRrSni3J
